mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FB_Board VALUES( FB_Board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM( SELECT * FROM FB_Board ORDER BY board_no DESC) t1 ) t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{currentPage}-1)*10+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{currentPage}*10

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM( SELECT * FROM FB_Board WHERE board_title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' ORDER BY board_no DESC) t1 ) t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{currentPage}-1)*10+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{currentPage}*10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FB_Board WHERE board_title LIKE '%'|| #{title} ||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE FB_Board SET board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_writedate = SYSDATE WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
UPDATE FB_Board SET board_readcount = board_readcount + 1 WHERE board_no = #{no}
